section.p: ‘That would be fractious little Nivram,’ says Knocklar after hearing your account. ‘He’s got it into his head to learn great sorcery, but he’s really just a bumbler who relies on other wizards’ inventions.’
You nod. ‘So he’s no great threat, then?’
Knocklar raises his eyebrows. ‘Oh, I wouldn’t say that. Once you’ve got on the wrong side of him he’ll use any amount of treacherous scheming to try to get his own back.’
There is no more opportunity for gossip. It is time you were on your way. .
